details: iBoxx bond indices offers broad benchmarking index solutions that track bond markets globally. iBoxx rules-based methodologies are publicly disclosed and designed to be replicable. Input data is sourced from various reliable and well-established partners/vendors like Bloomberg, Reuters, etc. via REST and/or FTP channels. Output data is distributed via REST and/or FTP channels in various csv/excel formats as per client requirements.
achievements: System re-architecture from monolith to microservices using domain driven design
Migration from on-premises infrastructure to AWS cloud-based infrastructure.
Launch of new loan indices products
Launch of new intraday bond indices products
